column1: File Description: Initial conditions in the year 1750 for the FAIR v2.0 simple climate model.

Code Source: Calculated using default Python model version under RCMIP historical emissions from https://github.com/njleach/
FAIR/tree/47c6eec031d2edcf09424394dbb86581a1b246ba

Paper Reference: Leach et al. 2021. "FaIRv2.0.0: a generalized impulse response model for climate
uncertainty and future scenario exploration," Geoscientific Model Development. https://doi.org/10.5194/gmd-14-3007-2021

Note: These values represent the period 1 model values produced by FAIR when run under the historic RCMIP emissions and forcing scenario. Here, period 1 corresponds to the year 1750. "thermal_box_x" terms refer to response of jth thermal box in 1750.
